metadata.name: Death, as seen by me
metadata.description:
"... in which there is no beginning, nor end, only an everlasting cycle of death and rebirth. Death cleaves at me till I am free of my anguish, and a new being cradles the shadow of my former self." 

"Death, as seen by me" (2021) oil paint, oil pastel and ink on 40 cm diameter canvas. This is one of my most recent self portraits, created at a time of intense change and existential questioning.
